description: Verification Order required to confirm the description and renumbering of 10 newly developed residential units located at 40-41 Nevern Square SW5 9PE, being part of the Internal reconfiguration of the existing bedsit accommodation at 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE to deliver 20 new self-contained one and two bedroom flats in total, linked to Planning application PP/17/05695, as follows:New residential Units40A Nevern Square SW5 9PE (Basement)40 Nevern Square SW5 9PE (Ground Floor)41A Nevern Square SW5 9PE (Basement)Flat 1, 41 Nevern Square SW5 9PE (Ground Floor)Flat 2, 41 Nevern Square SW5 9PE (1st Floor) Flat 3, 41 Nevern Square SW5 9PE (1st Floor)Flat 4, 41 Nevern Square SW5 9PE (3rd Floor)Flat 5, 41 Nevern Square SW5 9PE (3rd Floor)Flat 6, 41 Nevern Square SW5 9PE (4th Floor)Flat 7. 41 Nevern Square SW5 9PE (4th Floor)Existing Residential UnitsFlat 1, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 2, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 3, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 4, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 8, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 9, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 10, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 11, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 15, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 16, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 17, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 18, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 23, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 24, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 25, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 26, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 31, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 32, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 33, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.Flat 34, 40-42 Nevern Square SW5 9PE - To be deleted.
